about_page.hero_subtitle: We're on a mission to help businesses create, manage, and deliver exceptional digital experiences through innovative content technology.

mission_section.mission_description: At Contentstack, we believe that content is the foundation of every digital experience. Our mission is to provide teams with the tools and flexibility they need to create remarkable content experiences that drive engagement and business growth.
mission_section.mission_extended: We're building more than just a CMS – we're creating a composable digital experience platform that adapts to your needs, scales with your ambitions, and empowers your team to innovate without limits.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We constantly push boundaries to deliver cutting-edge solutions that keep our customers ahead of the curve.

values.title: Customer Success
values.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to providing exceptional support and resources to help you thrive.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Great things happen when teams work together. We build tools that enhance collaboration and productivity.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: We deliver enterprise-grade reliability and security so you can trust your content infrastructure to always perform.

values.title: Flexibility
values.description: We believe in giving you freedom. Our platform adapts to your workflow, not the other way around.

values.title: Continuous Improvement
values.description: We're never satisfied with good enough. We continuously evolve our platform based on feedback and innovation.

additional_services.title: Global CDN
additional_services.description: Deliver content at lightning speed with our globally distributed CDN infrastructure.

additional_services.title: Workflow Engine

additional_services.title: Personalization
additional_services.description: Deliver personalized content experiences based on user behavior and preferences.

additional_services.title: Asset Management
additional_services.description: Organize, optimize, and deliver digital assets with our powerful DAM system.

additional_services.title: Analytics & Insights
additional_services.description: Track content performance with detailed analytics and actionable insights.

additional_services.title: Scheduling
additional_services.description: Schedule content publication and expiration with precision timing controls.

additional_services.title: Webhooks & Events
additional_services.description: Integrate with any system using webhooks and real-time event notifications.

additional_services.title: Extensions & Apps

additional_services.title: Enterprise Security
additional_services.description: Bank-level security with SSO, 2FA, and comprehensive compliance certifications.

services_page.hero_badge: Everything You Need in One Platform
services_page.hero_subtitle: From content creation to delivery, workflow management to analytics—our comprehensive platform has you covered.

main_features.title: Headless CMS
main_features.description: True API-first content management that gives you the freedom to build with any technology stack. Separate your content from presentation and deliver it wherever your customers are.
main_features.features:
RESTful & GraphQL APIs
SDK support for all major frameworks
Flexible content modeling
Real-time content updates
Version control & rollback

main_features.title: Multi-Site Management
main_features.description: Manage multiple websites, apps, and digital properties from a single platform. Share content across sites or keep them completely separate—you're in control.
main_features.features:
Centralized content hub
Site-specific permissions
Cross-site content sharing
Multi-brand support
Localization & translation

main_features.title: Content Modeling
main_features.description: Create rich, structured content with our flexible content modeling tools. Define custom content types, relationships, and validations to match your exact needs.
main_features.features:
Drag-and-drop content builder
Modular blocks & components
Custom field types
Content references & relationships
Schema validation

contact_page.hero_subtitle: Whether you have questions about features, pricing, or need technical support, we're here to help.
contact_page.title: Contact Information Page

faqs.question: How quickly can I get started?
faqs.answer: You can sign up for a free trial and start using Contentstack immediately. Our onboarding process takes just a few minutes.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom pricing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer customized enterprise plans based on your specific needs. Contact our sales team for a personalized quote.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer 24/7 email support, dedicated account managers for enterprise clients, and extensive documentation and tutorials.

faqs.question: Can I migrate from my current CMS?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We provide migration tools and services to help you seamlessly transition from your existing CMS to Contentstack.

contact_page.hero_subtitle: Whether you have questions about features, pricing, or need a demo, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
